data.message: Hey Slim , are you going to release a new song, album or what? Come and save rap from the shit is covered from, cause I know everyone is ready for you to move on, like a cell in roam for the only phenomenal !

replies.message: HE WON'T YET HE'S CONTENT AND HAPPY ENOUGH IN DOING WHAT HE'S DOING AT MOMENT HE SAID THIS HIMSELF RECENTLY IN INTERVIEW :) AND HE HAS TO FEEL PASSIONATE ENOUGH AS MUCH AS HE LOVES DOING MUSIC AND PRODUCING ETC LOL ALSO IT TOOK HIM A WHOLE YEAR TO GET EVERYTHING PERFECT AND HOW HE WANTS IT ON HIS LAST ALBUM :) :O HE WILL WHEN HE'S READY
